import React from "react" import { css } from "aphrodite/no-important" import { isTypeItem } from "../Containers/select.config" import { Button, FormikControl } from "../../../Components" import baseStyle from "../../../styles" import loginStyles from "../../../styles/login" type CreateLocationProps = { formik: any } export const CreateLocation: React.FC = ({ formik }) => { const { values: { address } } = formik return <>
}
